title: EU consumption results in high carbon emissions from tropical deforestation, studies show

title_detail.value: EU consumption results in high carbon emissions from tropical deforestation, studies show

summary: A sixth of all emissions resulting from the typical diet of an EU citizen can be directly linked to deforestation of tropical forests. Two new studies shed new light on this impact, by combining satellite imagery of the rainforest, global land use statistics and data of international trade patterns.
